about_the_game:
The Dark Pursuer is a horror game that will test your nerves and survival skills. You are trapped in an abandoned place, but you are not alone. Something dark and dangerous lurks in the shadows, and it will stop at nothing to catch you. Can you find a way out before it’s too late?

You can play solo or with a friend in multiplayer mode. In solo mode, you have to explore the environment, find clues, and avoid the monster. In multiplayer mode, one of you is the player and the other is the monster. The player has to hide and run away from the monster, while the monster has to hunt down the player. You can create a name for your match and invite your friend to join from anywhere.

The game features three levels that you can choose from: Abandoned Hospital, Remote Field and Old Tunnels. Each level has its own atmosphere and secrets, and it will take you about 30 minutes to complete.

The game is compatible and optimized for all major operating systems including Android, iOS, Windows, Mac OS and Linux. Players from any platform can play with each other!

For a better experience, play with headphones!
